flavorText: It's an experience you'll never forget.

foreignData.flavorText: Eine Erfahrung, die du niemals vergisst.
foreignData.name: Geschenkte Stoßzähne
foreignData.text: Bis zum Ende des Zuges verliert eine Kreatur deiner Wahl alle Fähigkeiten und wird zu einem grünen Elefanten mit Basis-Stärke und -Widerstandskraft 3/3.

foreignData.flavorText: Es una experiencia que no se olvida.
foreignData.name: Don de colmillos
foreignData.text: Hasta el final del turno, la criatura objetivo pierde todas sus habilidades y se convierte en un Elefante verde con fuerza y resistencia base 3/3.

foreignData.name: Don d'ivoire
foreignData.text: Jusqu'à la fin du tour, la créature ciblée perd toutes ses capacités et devient un éléphant vert avec une force et une endurance de base de 3/3.

foreignData.flavorText: È un'esperienza che non dimenticherai mai.
foreignData.name: Dono delle Zanne
foreignData.text: Fino alla fine del turno, una creatura bersaglio perde tutte le abilità e diventa un Elefante verde con forza e costituzione base 3/3.

foreignData.flavorText: 一生忘れられない経験だ。
foreignData.name: 牙の贈り物
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それはすべての能力を失うとともに基本のパワーとタフネスが３/３の緑の象になる。

foreignData.name: 엄니 선물
foreignData.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 모든 능력을 잃고 기본 공격력 및 방어력이 3/3인 녹색 코끼리가 된다.

foreignData.flavorText: É uma experiência que você jamais esquecerá.
foreignData.name: Dádiva das Presas
foreignData.text: Até o final do turno, a criatura alvo perde todas as habilidades e torna-se um Elefante verde com poder e resistência básicos 3/3.

foreignData.name: Дар Бивней
foreignData.text: До конца хода целевое существо теряет все способности и становится зеленым Слоном с базовыми силой и выносливостью 3/3.

foreignData.flavorText: 此般经历会令你永生难忘。
foreignData.name: 象牙赋礼
foreignData.text: 直到回合结束，目标生物失去所有异能，且成为基础力量与防御力为3/3的绿色象。

foreignData.flavorText: 此般經歷會令你永生難忘。
foreignData.name: 象牙賦禮
foreignData.text: 直到回合結束，目標生物失去所有異能，且成為基礎力量與防禦力為3/3的綠色象。

name: Gift of Tusks
originalText: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a green Elephant with base power and toughness 3/3.

rulings.text: The creature will lose all other colors and creature types, but it will retain any other card types (such as artifact) or supertypes (such as legendary) it may have.

Gift of Tusks overwrites all previous effects that set the creature’s base power and toughness to specific values. Any power- or toughness-setting effects that start to apply after Gift of Tusks resolves will overwrite this effect.

Gift of Tusks doesn’t counter abilities that have already triggered or been activated. In particular, there is no way to cast this spell to stop a creature’s ability that says “At the beginning of your upkeep,” “When this creature enters the battlefield,” or similar from triggering.
If the affected creature gains an ability after Gift of Tusks resolves, it will keep that ability.

Effects that modify a creature’s power and/or toughness, such as the effect of Titanic Growth, will apply to the creature no matter when they started to take effect. The same is true for any counters that change its power and/or toughness and effects that switch its power and toughness.

text: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a green Elephant with base power and toughness 3/3.
